title: AI-generated video shows tiger drinking liquor; police issue notice to Insta use
description: NAGPUR, Nov 7: A “wildly” circulated, six-second social media clip showing a man feeding liquor to a tiger and casually patting the big cat on an empty street has been exposed as fake and entirely generated by Artificial Intelligence (AI). The deceptive video, which went viral with false claims of a stray tiger from the Pench Tiger Reserve, prompted the Nagpur rural police police to issue a legal notice to the Mumbai resident who ran the social media account responsible […]
content:
NAGPUR, Nov 7: A “wildly” circulated, six-second social media clip showing a man feeding liquor to a tiger and casually patting the big cat on an empty street has been exposed as fake and entirely generated by Artificial Intelligence (AI).

description: Artificial intelligence is sweeping through newsrooms, transforming the way journalists around the world gather and disseminate information.

title: Tesla Shareholders Didn’t Approve of Investment in Musk’s xAI
description: A Tesla Inc. shareholder proposal for the board to authorize an investment in xAI wasn’t approved, clouding prospects for the Elon Musk-led carmaker to take a stake in his artificial intelligence startup.
content:

title: How Artificial Intelligence Is Transforming Prospecting
description: AI isn’t replacing salespeople, it’s reprogramming how we find, engage, and build relationships with potential customers.
content: Nowhere is AI’s impact more visible than on LinkedIn. The platform has quietly become one of the most powerful ecosystems for AI-driven sales. Tools like Sales Navigator, AI-powered outreach assistants, and smart content analytics help entrepreneurs ... [1891 chars]

title: Bluepine Tech Foundation Launches Global AI Agricultural Data Service Platform
description: Singapore, Nov. 07, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Today, Bluepine Tech Foundation officially launched its 'Global AI Smart Agriculture Service Platform” and future 'Public Chain Plan”. By integrating blockchain, artificial intelligence, and Web3 technologies, the initiative aims to systematically address long-standing core challenges in the agricultural sector, such as data silos, lack of financial services, and imbalanced value distribution, thereby building a new agricultural digital ecosystem characterized by 'trusted data flow, precise service delivery, and equitable value distribution.'
content: Singapore, Nov. 07, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Today, Bluepine Tech Foundation officially launched its "Global AI Smart Agriculture Service Platform” and future "Public Chain Plan”. By integrating blockchain, artificial intelligence, and Web3 technolog... [4172 chars]

title: OpenAI Asks US to Expand Chips Act Tax Credit to AI Data Centers
description: OpenAI has asked the Trump administration to revamp a Chips Act tax credit to help lower the cost of artificial intelligence infrastructure, as the startup explores additional ways the US government can support an industrywide data center build-out for AI.

title: Trump Administration Rules Out AI Backstop Amid OpenAI Uproar
description: Trump administration officials are dismissing the idea of a financial backstop for artificial intelligence companies, US officials said, after comments from a top OpenAI executive raised questions about the prospects for a federal bailout.
